D

database_name - Static variable in class StockManager.SystemOptions
The name of the database that the user wants to use for this operation.
DataObject - Class in StockManager.SimpleDatabase
DataObject is the base class for any objects that you wish to store in the database.
DataObject() - Constructor for class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.DataObject
 
date - Variable in class StockManager.Objects.StockRecord
 
DBUpdateValue(String) - Method in class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.BooleanColumn
Updates the current value of this field from the string returned by the DB.
DBUpdateValue(String) - Method in class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.Column
Children implement this method to update their current value from the data extracted from the DB.
DBUpdateValue(String) - Method in class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.IntegerColumn
Updates this field with data retrieved from the database.
DBUpdateValue(String) - Method in class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.NumberColumn
Updates the value of this field with data from the DB.
DBUpdateValue(String) - Method in class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.Columns.TextColumn
Updates the value stored in this field.
DeleteTable(Class) - Static method in class StockManager.SimpleDatabase.SimpleDB
Drops the table for the given object type from the database.
do_restock - Static variable in class StockManager.SystemOptions
True if the user requested a restock / stock adjustment.
do_shopping - Static variable in class StockManager.SystemOptions
True if the user asked for shopping list generation.
do_status - Static variable in class StockManager.SystemOptions
True if the user simply wants a report on current stock quantities.
do_stocktake - Static variable in class StockManager.SystemOptions
True if the user requested a stocktake.
